Topic.Title: Is there something up with the servers?

Posts.EditableText: Trying to publish my game from the online server and whenever I try to edit, play or download my game, the message 'Server Error in '/' Application. Runtime Error' pops up. If this is because of some bad code I'm not sure how to resolve this, I'm also working on a mac, so I can't use the app.
Posts.HTML: Trying to publish my game from the online server and whenever I try to edit, play or download my game, the message 'Server Error in '/' Application. Runtime Error' pops up. If this is because of some bad code I'm not sure how to resolve this, I'm also working on a mac, so I can't use the app.
